law.catch_line: The Comptroller may issue a temporary authorization to a motor carrier to operate a commercial motor...
law.text:
The Comptroller may issue a temporary authorization to a motor carrier to operate a commercial motor vehicle in the State if the Comptroller is satisfied that:
the motor carrier does not have an identification marker or trip permit for the commercial motor vehicle;
unforeseen circumstances require operation of the commercial motor vehicle; and
a prohibition of operation would cause undue hardship.
